titles: The frantick 'squire: whose passionate love for a young lady caused his distraction, and since restoration, of his senses, he, with his own hand, writ this excellent new ditty. To the tune of Let Mary live long.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back,
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
